responsibilities: Work across all phases of the software development lifecycle (SDLC) for the design, development, testing, implementation, deployment, and maintenance of enterprise-scale data engineering and data platform solutions.
Build large-scale distributed systems and develop critical services in the data pipeline to empower users to deliver better content on the platform.
Design and build data transformations efficiently and reliably for reporting, growth analysis, and multi-dimensional analysis.
Design and implement reliable, scalable, robust, and extensible big data systems that support core products and business.
Upgrade old and outdated systems to new systems with higher performance improvements.
Help customers resolve any issues they encounter during usage.
Participate in designing micro-services to provide higher flexibility of the system.
Establish solid design and best engineering practices for engineers and non-technical audiences.
qualifications: Proficiency in software development lifecycle (SDLC) processes.
Expertise in building large-scale distributed systems.
Ability to develop critical services in data pipelines.
Skills in designing and building data transformations for analysis.
Experience in designing and implementing big data systems.
Problem-solving skills for upgrading systems and resolving customer issues.
Ability to establish design and engineering best practices.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed focus primarily on data engineering, software development, and building large-scale distributed systems. The responsibilities include tasks such as designing and implementing data platforms, building data transformations, and upgrading systems for better performance. The skills required include proficiency in the software development lifecycle, expertise in distributed systems, and knowledge of micro-services design.

There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on data engineering and system design rather than on AI model development or deployment. Therefore, it is unlikely that this job involves working with GenAI or LLMs.
